Package controller

Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
controller.GUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAppController, IGUIController
public class GUIController extends Object implements IGUIController
Controller implementation that handles user actions from the GUI. Delegates requests to the service layer and returns results or error messages.
